level_1_features.name: Spellcasting
level_1_features.description: You can cast prepared wizard spells using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability. You must prepare spells from your spellbook after a long rest.

level_1_features.name: Arcane Recovery
level_1_features.description: Once per day after a short rest, you can recover expended spell slots up to half your wizard level (rounded up).
